string.name: ignore_battery_dialog_message
string.font: In order to make sure that all messages delivered correctly you have to disable Battery Optimization.\n after clicking OK , choose %s and click on \'Don\'t optimize\'

string.name: ignore_battery_summary
string.font: In order to make sure that all messages delivered correctly you have to disable Battery Optimizations

" \n" " \n" " \n" " \n" "

Privacy Policy

\n"
" Socialbot (Pty) Ltd built the Socialbot app as a Freemium app. " This SERVICE is provided by Socialbot (Pty) Ltd at no cost and " is intended for use as is.\n"

"

\n" " This page is used to inform visitors regarding\n" " our policies with the collection, use, and\n" " disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use\n" " my Service.\n"

"

\n" " If you choose to use our Service, then you agree\n" " to the collection and use of information in relation to this\n" " policy. The Personal Information that we collect is\n" " used for providing and improving the Service.\n" " We will not use or share your\n" " information with anyone except as described in this Privacy\n" " Policy.\n"

"

\n" " The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings\n" " as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at\n" " Socialbot unless otherwise defined in this Privacy\n" " Policy.\n"

"

Information Collection and Use


\n" " For a better experience, while using our Service,\n" " We may require you to provide us with certain\n" " personally identifiable information, including but not limited to Contacts in your Phonebook,Your Phone Number,Your Profile Picture. The\n" " information that we request will be\n" " securely saved on our secure Servers, we will never share these information without your permission.\n" "

\n" " your name, number, and your profile Picture will be available publicly to other users.\n" "

\n"
" The app does use third party services that may collect\n" " information used to identify you.\n"

"

\n" " Link to privacy policy of third party service providers\n" " used by the app\n"

"

  • Google Play Services


Log Data


\n" " We want to inform you that whenever\n" " you use our Service, in a case of an error in the\n" " app we collect data and information (through third\n" " party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data\n" " may include information such as your device Internet\n" " Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system\n" " version, the configuration of the app when utilizing\n" " our Service, the time and date of your use of the\n" " Service, and other statistics.\n"

"

\n" "

Permissions we request


\n" "

    \n" "
  • Contacts: to be able to communicate with your Friends that are in your Contacts
    • \n" "
  • Camera: to be able to Take Pictures/Videos and to be able to make Video Calls.
    • \n" "
  • Microphpone: to be able to send Voice Messages and also to be able to make Voice/Video Calls.
    • \n" "
  • Storage: to save the Sent/Received Files in your Device
    • \n"
    "
\n" "

\n" " \n" "

Cookies


\n" " Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are\n" " commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are\n" " sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and\n" " are stored on your device's internal memory.\n"

"

\n" " This Service does not use these “cookies” explicitly.\n" " However, the app may use third party code and libraries that\n" " use “cookies” to collect information and improve their\n" " services. You have the option to either accept or refuse\n" " these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your\n" " device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be\n" " able to use some portions of this Service.\n"

"

Service Providers


\n" " We may employ third-party companies\n" " and individuals due to the following reasons:\n"

"

  • To facilitate our Service;
  • To provide the Service on our behalf;
  • To perform Service-related services; or
  • To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.

\n"

" We want to inform users of this\n" " Service that these third parties have access to your\n" " Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks\n" " assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated\n" " not to disclose or use the information for any other\n" " purpose.\n"

"

Security


\n" " We value your trust in providing us\n" " your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use\n" " commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember\n" " that no method of transmission over the internet, or method\n" " of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and\n" " we cannot guarantee its absolute security.\n"

"

Links to Other Sites


\n" " This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click\n" " on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site.\n" " Note that these external sites are not operated by\n" " us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to\n" " review the Privacy Policy of these websites.\n" " We have no control over and assume no\n" " responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or\n" " practices of any third-party sites or services.\n"

"

Children’s Privacy


\n" " These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13.\n" " We do not knowingly collect personally\n" " identifiable information from children under 13. In the case\n" " we discover that a child under 13 has provided\n" " us with personal information,\n"

" We will immediately delete this from our servers. If you\n" " are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child\n" " has provided us with personal information, please contact\n" " us so that we will be able to take the\n" " necessary actions.\n"

"

Changes to This Privacy Policy


\n" " We may update our Privacy Policy from\n" " time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page\n" " periodically for any changes. We will\n" " notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy\n" " on this page. These changes are effective immediately after\n" " they are posted on this page.\n"

"

Contact Us

\n"
" If you have any questions or suggestions about\n" " our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact\n" " us at info@socialbot.co.za\n" "

\n" " \n" " \n"
